name: 3 Onion Sesame Crunch Rice

ingredients.name: Nourish Broth
ingredients.additionalInstruction: or light coconut milk for a creamier version

preparation: In Multipurpose Pot, combine all ingredients.
Cover and bring to a boil over medium heat. Simmer, covered, for 12–15 minutes, or until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed.
Fluff with a fork and serve.
tips: Make it vegan: use light coconut milk instead of Broth

products.name: Nourish Broth Mix
summary: Rich taste of slowly simmered chicken with garden-fresh flavours of onion, celery, and herbs. Just add water!

products.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix
summary: These onions won’t make you cry—they’re pure happiness in a jar! Save time (and tears) on chopping and use this blend anytime you’re looking for the robust flavour of onions, chives, and scallions. Take it way beyond the dip bowl and use 3 Onion as a sauce or seasoning for eggs, veggies, burgers, tacos, and more!
